availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William A. Haycraft (Washington County, Mississippi, county clerk)

body.p: Washington County, Mississippi, county clerk. Kentucky native. County clerk in Greenville, Mississippi, in 1861. Circuit court clerk in Washington County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Mississippi, Washington County, Greenville, p. 8B.
“List of Deaths to Date,” The Weekly-Democrat Times (Greenville, MS), Sept. 14, 1878, p. 1.
Franklin L. Riley, ed., Publications of the Mississippi Historical Society, No. 14 (Oxford, Ms: University of Mississippi, 1914), 284-85.
KYR-0001-017-0136.
